articles.description: Fewer face-to-face encounters among teens may harm mental health and growth, and governments should weigh this effect as they consider the need for extended pandemic social-distancing measures, researchers said.

articles.title: Face masks critical in preventing the spread of Covid-19: Study - Morung Express
